title: !!!FREE SKINS NO SCam!!!!!
body:
GO TO THIS LINK TO GET EXCLUSE FREE SKINS!!!! NOT A SCAM!!!!! 
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/promotion/come-and-join-us-social-media

replies.body: Saying it isn't a scam immediately makes it suspicious lol. While this *is* a legitimate link to the Twitter promotion for Dreadknight Garen, it'd probably be better to link the [support page here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-), as it provides details for all 3 of the skin/champion offers.

You can get the skin (and champions) for free off Riot:

Tristana - Riot Girl Tristana (like Riot's Facebook page)

Garen - Dreadknight Garen (follow Riot on Twitter)

Alistar - Unchained Alistar (subscribe to Riot's YouTube) (requires you to send a Support ticket for OCE server)

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cPxEYGZP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-28T03:36:26.047+0000)
>
> HOW TO VIRUS 101 
> 
> ftfy

these were out since LoL OCE started lel
